attributes.action: extened the use of forces rail cards to retired services personnel.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Would like to see the forces rail card extended to retired service persons. With the rising costs of travel most service persons have been on such poor pay for so many years, when they retire most find it hard to settle near home and therefore should have the right to get to see their families once they retire from the forces

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
